channel.title: NetherScape - Bringing back what we once had, but now dream of
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1236.photobucket.com/albums/ff442/OfficialNether/Untitled-1.png[/img] Hello, my name is .cLass, also known as cLass or dotcLass. I have decided to purchase a VPS and test my Java programming skills by making a "Old School PK server". I haven't seen any server yet that focuses on just that, so I thought I would be the first.
For example, the Elvemage/Kids Ranqe/I Mahatma I times, will be revived.
Basic PK items will be located in stores, and more advanced ones will be monster dropped.
[B][U]Client[/U][/B] • 474 Gameframe (Can't take credit for this, as it was already in the client.) [COLOR=green]• Custom background[/COLOR] (Made by me) [COLOR=green]• Basic clipped following implented[/COLOR] (Will be tweaked the more by the more I learn.) [COLOR=red]• Removed custom features such as new HP bar/new hitsplats/10x damage[/COLOR] [I]More to come...[/I]
[B][U]Server[/U][/B] [COLOR=green]• Shops, customized so you can start PKing immediatly[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]• Correct animations for all weapons[/COLOR] (Needs more tweaking) [COLOR=green]• Based on Project Insanity[/COLOR] (I downloaded the clean one, and since then i've added everything that's currently in it myself.) [I]More to come...[/I]
[B][U]VPS Specs[/U][/B] OS: Linux Ubuntu DL/UL: [COLOR=green]100/80mb[/COLOR] Server located in: Sweden RAM: [COLOR=green]30GB[/COLOR] HDD: 100GB Monthly cost: ~300$
[B][U]Website information[/U][/B] URL: [url=http://www.netherscape.smffy.com]www.netherscape.smffy.com[/url] (Will get a .com domain if this will be a successful project and we'll grow bigger) Hosted by: Smfnew.com
[B][U]Server information[/U][/B] • Will restart once every week. It has worked fine so far with ~15 people online but if/when we grow larger and experience lagg the restart cycle will be shortened.
[B][U]Pictures[/U][/B] [I]Coming soon...[/I]
[B][U]Development progress until Beta can be released[/U][/B] [COLOR=green]l|l|[/COLOR][COLOR=red]l|l|l|l[/COLOR] (~Approx 2 days left)[/CENTER]

item.title: NetherScape - Bringing back what we once had, but now dream of
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Uhm… A lot of time, patience, and work is going to have to be put into this, good luck though.

Read full topic

item.title: NetherScape - Bringing back what we once had, but now dream of
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:2, topic:408398"]Shrink your fucking banner.

Anyways, I suggest you have your cycle time preset to 600 (if you didn’t know), the client updates the player ever 600 milliseconds and the client grabs a new piece of data every 30 ms.

But anyways, uhm good luck?[/quote]

I do not understand how to do this.

Read full topic

item.title: NetherScape - Bringing back what we once had, but now dream of
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:4, topic:408398"][quote author=.cLass link=topic=509682.msg3697978#msg3697978 date=1312568456]

Shrink your fucking banner.

Anyways, I suggest you have your cycle time preset to 600 (if you didn’t know), the client updates the player ever 600 milliseconds and the client grabs a new piece of data every 30 ms.

But anyways, uhm good luck?

  1. Sure i’ll attempt to make a smaller version of it ^^
  2. Do you mean minutes with the 600? 10 hours sounds great
    [/quote]

noooo, 500 milliseconds in a regular servers tick rate, but 600 is a lot more efficient.[/quote]
Umm… are you suggesting the server to restart each 600ms? :L

Read full topic

item.title: NetherScape - Bringing back what we once had, but now dream of
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

[CENTER]
Hello, my name is .cLass, also known as cLass or dotcLass. I have decided to purchase a VPS and test my Java programming skills by making a “Old School PK server”. I haven’t seen any server yet that focuses on just that, so I thought I would be the first.

For example, the Elvemage/Kids Ranqe/I Mahatma I times, will be revived.

Basic PK items will be located in stores, and more advanced ones will be monster dropped.

Client
• 474 Gameframe (Can’t take credit for this, as it was already in the client.)
[COLOR=green]• Custom background[/COLOR] (Made by me)
[COLOR=green]• Basic clipped following implented[/COLOR] (Will be tweaked the more by the more I learn.)
[COLOR=red]• Removed custom features such as new HP bar/new hitsplats/10x damage[/COLOR]
More to come…

Server
[COLOR=green]• Shops, customized so you can start PKing immediatly[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]• Correct animations for all weapons[/COLOR] (Needs more tweaking)
[COLOR=green]• Based on Project Insanity[/COLOR] (I downloaded the clean one, and since then i’ve added everything that’s currently in it myself.)
More to come…

VPS Specs
OS: Linux Ubuntu
DL/UL: [COLOR=green]100/80mb[/COLOR]
Server located in: Sweden
RAM: [COLOR=green]30GB[/COLOR]
HDD: 100GB
Monthly cost: ~300$

Website information
URL: www.netherscape.smffy.com (Will get a .com domain if this will be a successful project and we’ll grow bigger)
Hosted by: Smfnew.com

Server information
• Will restart once every week. It has worked fine so far with ~15 people online but if/when we grow larger and experience lagg the restart cycle will be shortened.

Pictures
Coming soon…

Development progress until Beta can be released
[COLOR=green]l|l|[/COLOR][COLOR=red]l|l|l|l[/COLOR]
(~Approx 2 days left)[/CENTER]

Read full topic
